name: EXO_encounter 667
description:
EXO_encounter 667 is a game of exploration and first contact. You play as an unmanned expedition to the remote exoplanet Gliese 667 Cc which crashes near ruins of unknown origin. What mysteries will you find?

Written in the Fennel programming language; winner of the Lisp Game Jam 2018.

During the game you can press escape to view the help screen which lists controls.

Game source is distributed under the GPLv3 and available on GitLab. Music and art released under creative-commons licenses; see credits for details.
